report:
**Damage Report:**

**Vehicle Make/Model:** [Insert Vehicle Make/Model]
**VIN:** [Insert VIN Number]
**Date of Inspection:** [Insert Date]

---

**Location of Damage:**
- The rear passenger side of the vehicle shows visible scratches and scuffs on the paint.

**Type of Damage:**
- The damage appears to be superficial scratches and scuffs, likely caused by minor impacts or rubbing against objects.
- There are no signs of deeper dents, dings, or significant bodywork damage.

**Additional Notes:**
- The scratches are concentrated near the rear bumper area.
- The paint seems intact with no visible peeling or bubbling.
- No other areas of the vehicle show similar damage.

**Conclusion:**
The vehicle has minor surface scratches and scuffs that do not require repair at this time. Further inspection may be necessary if the scratches worsen over time or if they become more pronounced.

**Prepared By:**
[Your Name]  
Insurance Adjuster  
[Your Company Name]  
[Contact Information]  

**Date:**
[Insert Date]
